text: Kenneth French Berry (October 10, 1916 – April 26, 2003) was a member of the Ohio General Assembly. He served the 19th District of the Ohio Senate in 1972. He lost the primary election, and thus served less than a year after being appointed.http://www.coshoctonfoundation.org/index.php?option=com_content&task;=view&id;=21&Itemid;=36 Veteran of World War II. Served over 4 years in the Armed Services including 42 months overseas. Served in Papaun, Bismarck Archipelago, New Guinea, Netherland East Indies and Philippine Campaigns. ==References== Category:1916 births Category:Ohio state senators Category:Ohio Republicans Category:2003 deaths Category:People from Coshocton, Ohio Category:20th-century American politicians
title: Kenneth F. Berry
